Posts.Content: Jan 16, 2013 06:53AM Adavisart wrote: Hello, I just joined the board. Had Bilateral mastectomy with reconstruction in Friday Jan. 11, 2013. I am at home recovering and just woke up with a big wet spot on my back where one of the drains is leaking. I am waiting for the doctors office to open to call and find out what to do. What a pain!!
Posts.Title: January 2013 surgery JRMH Lbwagner69
